getRelay.Description: it returns a object with relayID, cloudURL, build_version and IP for a single relay.

getAllRelays.Description: it returns a object with relayID, cloudURL, build_version and IP

upgradeRelayWithUrl.Description: it start to download a build in a gateway and upgrade them.

upgradeAllRelaysWithUrl.Description: it start to download a build in all gateway and upgrade them.

getUpgrade.Description: it returns the status of download build in a gateway.

getAllUpgrade.Description: t returns the status of download build in all gateway

upgradeGateway.Description: scp copy a build to gateways and start upgrade

downloadBuild.Description: download a build in your PC

clearBuild.Description: clear out all the builds in build folder

runCommandOnGW.Usage:
runCommandOnGW [relayID/all] [command to be run] 
		 Example: runCommandOnGW WDRL00000M info

uploadClientToGW.Description: start client to all gateways in the network
